title: Nissan MCP1F2A20LV 4000 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift with Hydraulic Fork Positioner
item_description:
Nissan MCP1F2A20LV 4000 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift with Hydraulic Fork Positioner

  • Manufacturer: Nissan
  • Model: MCP1F2A20LV
  • Load Capacity: 4000 Lb
  • Fuel Type: Propane
  • Mast Type: Two Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 6772
  • Serial Number: CP1F2-9P9747
  • Truck Weight: 7175 Lbs
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 80”
  • Engine: Nissan
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Fork Length: 42”
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Unit is fully functional but does not drive forward or backward. Seller suspects a sensor is faulty.
  • Function Test:
    • Turns left and right
    • Tilts up and down
    • Shifts left and right
    • Forks position in and out
    • Mast travels up and down
    • Unit does not drive forward or backward
  • Features:
    • Side Shift
    • Tilt
    • Hydraulic Fork Positioner
